name: Lito
description:
Thanks to the evil dark creatures the Sun is not shining as bright as it used to, the world is in darkness. Lito is the only remaining living being who can emit light and it is his duty to defeat the creatures of the darkness and bring light back to the world.

Lito needs to handle many dangerous obstacles and traps on the way in order to succeed.  In tough situations Lito can use his magical abilities:

Freeze - Freezes an object, making it unable to move.

Drag - Replaces an object using Litos telekinetic powers.

Destroy - Blows up an object.

Create Road - Creates a walkable surface between two points.

Using these abilities comes with a cost though. Each powerup reduces the amount of light Lito emits so he will see less and less of his surroundings. 

Succesfully overcoming the obstacles in a level rewards Lito with points to upgrade his abilities with.

Created by Adam Száraz, Krisztian Tóth, Tibor Zalabai
